summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FounderPlane startup consultancy platform. All backend APIs, frontend pages, lead capture forms, admin dashboard, and AI integration working perfectly.

design_issues.issue: Custom 404 page handling may need attention for unknown routes

AI stage assessment with GPT-5.2 integration
All 6 service pages loading with correct branding
Lead capture forms on all service pages
Stage Clarity Check modal and quiz functionality
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider implementing a custom 404 page component for better user experience on unknown routes. All other functionality is working perfectly.
